website_summaries.verdict: Don't let the lower price fool you — these Ugg slippers are structured for comfort just like pricier options by the brand.
pros: One of the most affordable pairs of men's slippers by Ugg
Consumers also praise them for their looks, which some find practical to wear casually like loafers
cons: Sizes may run a bit narrow for some individuals, especially those with wide feet

customer_reviews.title: I love Uggs. This is my second pair
customer_reviews.text: I love Uggs. This is my second pair. First was a slipper my wife gave me for Xmas years ago. And they're still gong good. They don't ever seem to wear out. They also don't need any breaking in. Comfy from day one. This pair is great because you can just stick your foot in when lounging around the house. And when you go out, then pull the back over your heel for a good looking loafer. What more can you ask of a shoe!
customer_reviews.author: OSU Fan

customer_reviews.title: These slipper do the trick after a lot of failed attempts lol
customer_reviews.text: These are the best slippers without spending a tonI've found and I tried a bunch. The back is ingenious, can stay up and you have a shoe kind of thing on your foot. Or drops down and you got yourself a clog kind of thing. Both options work well, depending on what situation your in.
customer_reviews.author: April at Elation

customer_reviews.title: Son loved them
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 13 yr old son. At first glance he didn’t pay them much attention. I made him try them on for size and he fell in love with them. He says that there very comfortable and wears them inside our home every day now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size 10 length is normal, but width is smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my usual size 10. The length was fine and as expected, but thexcellent width is excessively tight. If this is normal and expected to stretch to a normal width, then I'll upgrade my rating (when it does).
customer_reviews.author: Michael F.

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made slippers.
customer_reviews.text: Gave these to my bro-in-law for a gift. He wears a 12.5 D shoe and says that the size 13 fits perfectly. As you would expect with UGGs, they're beautifully made, too.
customer_reviews.author: needingknittles

customer_reviews.title: The "name" is way too expensive!
customer_reviews.text: This slipper just has a heel that is sewn onto a "slide" version does no good at keeping them on your feet. $10 WalMart version stays on your feet, just as warm, more choices, and you could buy 10 pair. Done with Ugg products.
customer_reviews.author: J. Honey

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. Very comfortable. Hope they last as long as my last pair of uggs
customer_reviews.author: Tom Carlton

customer_reviews.title: Bad Design
customer_reviews.text: Poor design. I want my 20 year old design slippers by UGG, rebuilt. The flappy heal, should it be up or down flat. Both feel bad. Flap up and you get a nice tag to plant your heel on.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE!
customer_reviews.text: Great slipper/shoes. I use theses everywhere around the house and the ability to pull the back up to keep the shoes on while going up and down stairs is a great addition.
customer_reviews.author: ChargerMan

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and convenient but runs small
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable but runs small. I had to switch it in for a bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: menuha

customer_reviews.title: Not so durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my boyfriend. The back of one side tore after only a few times of use
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Problem with left foot edema. Tried many slippers with poor results. At last a pair that adjust to both feet. Happy with these!
customer_reviews.author: EMR

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for hanging around the house or even running a quick errand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't know how Chinese measure but I order 11 and ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't know how Chinese measure but I order 11 and these could not get into a size 8...getting a little pissed off any thing from china...live and learn amazon beware!!!!
customer_reviews.author: charles b. maginnis

customer_reviews.title: They are great. My husband doesn’t like wearing slippers but these ...
customer_reviews.text: They are great. My husband doesn’t like wearing slippers but these look more like a casual shoe. Really like the soft heel so they can be slip-ones as well. Would prefer a brown pair next time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable with a stylish and clean look
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable with a stylish and clean look. Looks very similar to the boots with pants on. Only downside is it does not have fur lining on the back part of the slipper just a flimsy piece of sheepskin which looks like it will stretch out over time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, fits well
customer_reviews.text: Warm, comfortable, fits well. I have wide feet so I bought a size up. I would buy these again
customer_reviews.author: jcunno86

customer_reviews.title: Happy Feet !!
customer_reviews.text: These are a great product by far the best slippers I ve ever put my feet into nice lookin too my feet are happy Happy will highly recommend over & over thanks
customer_reviews.author: jerry williams

customer_reviews.title: Birthday gift well loved
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my husband and he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: The Maisons

customer_reviews.title: The fit is great! My feet don't sweat
customer_reviews.text: The fit is great! My feet don't sweat, which is a HUGE plus. The heel cup can fold in if I feel like wearing them as a slide.
customer_reviews.author: JustJakeKC

customer_reviews.title: Best Uggs ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love slippers. I especially love Ugg slippers. These are by far my favorite of all time. Comfortable 13/10.
customer_reviews.author: Dean T.

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: Super small, I couldnt even get my foot in it. Suffice to say I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Colton Robinson

product_meta.title: UGG Men's Cooke Slip-On Slipper
product_meta.description: The cooke reimagines the loafer with a sportier silhouette. crafted from soft suede and lined with natural wool, this sleek casual is durable enough for outdoor wear thanks to the eva sole.
feature_bullets: Low-profile molded EVA outsole with patented tread design for indoor and outdoor use
